document.full_text: an assistant college professor was in a federal jail on wednesday after he went to philadelphia airport to meet a mother and her young daughter for what he thought was a sex deal. it was an fbi deal.
document.title: professor in sex sting accused of luring underage girl
lines_and_colors: an assistant college professor was in a federal jail on wednesday after he went to philadelphia airport to meet a mother and her young daughter for what he thought was a sex deal. it was an fbi deal.
